{"settings":"{
  "git.autofetch": true,
  "clangd.path": "/home/ensismoebius/.config/Code/User/globalStorage/llvm-vs-code-extensions.vscode-clangd/install/19.1.2/clangd_19.1.2/bin/clangd",
  "python-envs.terminal.showActivateButton": true,
  "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
  "git.confirmSync": false,
  "editor.inlayHints.enabled": "offUnlessPressed",
  "[json]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features",
  },
  "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
  "workbench.iconTheme": "vscode-icons",
  "chat.mcp.gallery.enabled": true,
  "github.copilot.chat.githubMcpServer.enabled": true,
  "diffEditor.codeLens": true,
  "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
  "terminal.integrated.inheritEnv": false,
  "claudeCode.preferredLocation": "panel",
  "http.systemCertificatesNode": true,
  "geminicodeassist.agentYoloMode": true,
  "chat.tools.global.autoApprove": true,
  "breadcrumbs.enabled": false,
  "editor.stickyScroll.enabled": false,
  "editor.mouseWheelZoom": true,
  "terminal.integrated.mouseWheelZoom": true,
  "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.decorationsEnabled": "gutter",
  "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.environmentReporting": true,
  "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.history": 1000,
  "cmake.showConfigureWithDebuggerNotification": false,
  "editor.minimap.renderCharacters": false,
  "editor.minimap.size": "fill",
  "[jsonc]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.json-language-features"
  },
  "task.allowAutomaticTasks": "on",
  "c-cpp-flylint.clang.configFile": ".clangd",
  "c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.configFile": ".cppcheck",
  "c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.verbose": true,
  "c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.force": true,
  "c-cpp-flylint.lizard.enable": false,
  "c-cpp-flylint.ignoreParseErrors": true,
  "clangd.checkUpdates": true,
  "c-cpp-flylint.excludeFromWorkspacePaths": [
    "/build/**",
    "/third_party/**",
    "/external/**",
    "/.vscode/**",
    "/.git/**",
    "/node_modules/**",
    "/out/**",
    "/dist/**",
    "/.gemini/**",
    "/docs/**",
    "/lib/**"
  ],
  "c-cpp-flylint.standard": [
    "c11",
    "c++20"
  ],
  "c-cpp-flylint.includePaths": [
    "/src/**"
  ],
  "[markdown]": {
    "editor.defaultFormatter": "prettier.prettier-vscode"
  },
  "c-cpp-flylint.flexelint.enable": false,
  "github.copilot.nextEditSuggestions.enabled": true,
  "chat.agent.maxRequests": 1000,
  "github.copilot.enable": {
    "*": true,
    "plaintext": false,
    "markdown": true,
    "scminput": false
  },
  "chat.customAgentInSubagent.enabled": true,
  "chat.editor.wordWrap": "on",
  "chat.mcp.discovery.enabled": {
    "claude-desktop": true,
    "cursor-workspace": true,
    "cursor-global": true,
    "windsurf": true
  },
  "chat.tools.terminal.autoReplyToPrompts": true,
  "chat.useNestedAgentsMdFiles": true,
  "chat.viewSessions.orientation": "stacked",
  "search.followSymlinks": false,
  "editor.wordWrap": "wordWrapColumn",
  "window.commandCenter": false,
  "workbench.layoutControl.enabled": false,
  "chat.instructionsFilesLocations": {
    ".github/copilot-instructions.md": true
  },
  "terminal.explorerKind": "both",
  "chat.useAgentSkills": true
}"}
